body.p: Returns the data value associated to a specified property name. The properties correspond to fields defined in the section under which the document is located.
The data value associated to a specified property name.
Suppose that "Section1" has in its definition the fields title and text. This code obtains the values for these properties in "doc1":

example.preformat: <#assign doc1 = liquidsite.findDocument("Section1/doc1")> <#assign title = doc1.title> <#assign text = doc1.text>
